fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, International co-operation and development, Education and training, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: As of this writing, our organization will concentrate on the observation in EU initiatives with regards to these two sub-regions.
organisation_name: Eastern Caribbean-Southeast Asia Economic and Cultural Chamber (ECSEACHAMBER)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The primary goal of the Chamber is to engage and facilitate tourism, trade, investment and external relations between six (6) independent Eastern Caribbean countries and the growing Southeast Asian community not only in the ASEAN region but also around the world. Realizing that there is a distinct lack of a relationship between the emerging island nations in the Eastern Caribbean and the actively developed Southeast Asian countries, the Chamber hopes to be instrumental to bridge this important gap. More importantly, understanding the great and successful partnerships that the EU has with both these regions, it is but natural for the Chamber to take part and observe in the ongoing relationships and activities between the EU and these two economic regions.
relevant_communication: In the future, our organization will commence informational activities to highlight the objectives, aspirations and achievements that has effectively resulted from both the standing partnerships with these regions. Including  various programs discussed in the EU-ASEAN Joint Cooperation Committee as well as activities in the EU-Caribbean Economic Partnership Agreement.
